title: Elysium
description: The first installment in the trilogy of The Broken, Elysium is the debut novel of young fiction writer, K. B. Ezzell. In the year 2114, North America has evolved into a wealthy and powerful empire under the rule of a man determined to create perfection by whatever means necessary. Terra Drake has spent a secluded childhood shielded by her parents from the truth of the world she lives in, until she is chosen at age seventeen to be a part of an exclusive project, designed by the Emperor himself, to make gods out of exceptional people. Terra is transported to a mysterious fortress on the sea and introduced to a world of ideas from which she was previously hidden, fantastical science that is beyond mere imagination, and an enigmatic stranger who defies both logic and expectations. She quickly falls in love with the perfect blue skies surrounding intellectual oasis and finds she is truly happy among the most exceptional people in the universe. But with true happiness always comes the thundering notion that is just might be too good to be true. And there is a price that must be paid for ignorance.
author: K.B. Ezzell
